Verses: 1 raajyam Muzhuvadhaiyum Aalumpadikkuth Than Raajyaththinmel Nootrirubadhu Dhesaadhipadhigalaiyum,

2 raajaavukku Nashtam Varaadhapadikku Andha Dhesaadhipadhigal Kanakku Oppuvikkiradharkaaga Avargalukku Melaaga Moondru Pradhaanigalaiyum Erpaduththuvadhu Thariyuvukku Nalamendru Kandadhu; Ivargalil Dhaaniyel Oruvanaayirundhaan.

3 ippadiyirukkaiyil Dhaaniyel Pradhaanigalukkum Dhesaadhipadhigalukkum Merpattavanaayirundhaan; Dhaaniyelukkul Viseshiththa Aavi Irundhamaiyaal Avanai Raajyam Muzhumaikkum Adhikaariyaaga Erpaduththa Raajaa Ninaiththaan.

4 appozhudhu Pradhaanigalum Dhesaadhipadhigalum Raajyaththin Visaarippile Dhaaniyelaik Kutrappaduththumpadi Mugaandharam Thedinaargal; Aanaalum Oru Mugaandharaththaiyum Kutraththaiyum Kandupidikka Avargalaal Koodaadhirundhadhu; Avan Unmaiyullavanaayirundhapadiyaal Avanmel Sumaththa Yaadhoru Kutramum Kuraivum Kaanappadavillai.

5 appozhudhu Andha Manushar: Naam Indha Dhaaniyelai Avanudaiya Dhevanaippatriya Vedhavishayaththile Kutrappaduththum Mugaandharaththaik Kandupidiththaalozhiya Avanai Verondrilum Kutrappaduththum Mugaandharaththaik Kandupidikkak Koodaadhu Endraargal.
6 pinbu Andhap Pradhaanigalum Dhesaadhipadhigalum Koottankoodi Raajaavinidaththil Poi, Avanai Nokki: Thariyu Raajaave, Neer Endrum Vaazhga.

7 evanaagilum Muppadhu Naalvaraiyil Raajaavaagiya Ummaiththavira Endha Dhevanaiyaanaalum Manushanaiyaanaalum Nokki, Yaadhoru Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Vinnappampanninaal, Avan Singangalin Kebiyile Podappada, Raajaa Kattalai Pirappiththu, Urudhiyaana Thaakkeedhu Seyyavendumendru Raajyaththinudaiya Ellaap Pradhaanigalum, Dhesaadhipadhigalum, Prabukkalum, Mandhirimaargalum Thalaivargalum Aalosanaipannikkondirukkiraargal.

8 aadhalaal Ippodhum Raajaave, Medhiyarukkum Persiyarukkum Irukkira Maaraadha Pramaanaththinpadiye, Andhath Thaakkeedhu Maatrappadaadhapadi Neer Adhaik Kattalaiyittu, Adharkuk Kaiyezhuththu Vaikkavendum Endraargal.
9 appadiye Raajaavaagiya Thariyu Andhak Kattalaippaththiraththukkuk Kaiyezhuththu Vaiththaan.

10 dhaaniyelovendraal, Andhap Paththiraththukkuk Kaiyezhuththu Vaikkappattadhendru Arindhapodhilum, Than Veettukkullepoi, Than Melaraiyile Erusalemukku Neraaga Palaganigal Thirandhirukka, Ange Thaan Mun Seydhuvandhapadiye Dhinam Moondru Velaiyum Than Dhevanukku Munbaaga Muzhangaarpadiyittu Jebampanni, Sthoththiram Seluththinaan.
11 appozhudhu Andha Manusharkoottankoodi, Dhaaniyel Than Dhevanukku Munbaaga Jebampanni Vinnappamseygiradhaik Kandaargal.

12 pinbu Avargal Raajaavukku Munbaaga Vandhu, Raajaavin Thaakkeedhaikkuriththu: Endha Manushanaagilum Muppadhu Naalvaraiyil Raajaavaagiya Ummaiththavira Endha Dhevanaiyaanaalum Manushanaiyaanaalum Nokki Yaadhoru Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Vinnappam Panninaal, Avan Singangalin Kebiyile Podappadavendum Endru Neer Kattalaippaththiraththil Kaiyezhuththu Vaiththeer Allavaa Endraargal; Adharku Raajaa: Andhak Kaariyam Medhiyarukkum Persiyarukkum Irukkira Maaraadha Pramaanaththinpadi Urudhiyaakkappattadhe Endraan.

13 appozhudhu Avargal Raajaavai Nokki: Siraipidikkappatta Yoodheyaadhesaththin Puththiraril Dhaaniyel Enbavan Ummaiyum Neer Kaiyezhuththu Vaiththukkoduththa Kattalaiyaiyum Madhiyaamal, Dhinam Moondru Velaiyum Thaan Pannum Vinnappaththaip Pannugiraan Endraargal.

14 raajaa Indha Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Thannil Migavum Sanjalappattu, Dhaaniyelaik Kaappaatrumpadikku Avanperil Than Manadhai Vaiththu, Avanaith Thappuvikkiradharkaaga Sooriyan Asthamikku Mattum Prayaasappattukkondirundhaan.
